title: Unstack
command: yabai -m window --toggle float && yabai -m window --toggle float

title: Focus Next in Stack
command: yabai -m window --focus stack.next 2>/dev/null || yabai -m window --focus stack.first

title: Focus Prev in Stack
command: yabai -m window --focus stack.prev 2>/dev/null || yabai -m window --focus stack.last

title: Focus Next
command: yabai -m window --focus next 2>/dev/null || yabai -m window --focus first

title: Focus Prev
command: yabai -m window --focus prev 2>/dev/null || yabai -m window --focus last

title: Send to Next Space
command: yabai -m window --space next 2>/dev/null || yabai -m window --space first

title: Send to Prev Space
command: yabai -m window --space prev 2>/dev/null || yabai -m window --space last

title: Send to Prev Display
command: yabai -m window --space prev 2>/dev/null || yabai -m window --space last

title: Send to Next Display
command: yabai -m window --space next 2>/dev/null || yabai -m window --space first
